yarnCountConverter.title: यार्न काउंट कनवर्टर
yarnCountConverter.description: Ne, Nm, Tex और Denier यार्न काउंट सिस्टम के बीच कनवर्ट करें
yarnCountConverter.seoTitle: Yarn Count Converter - Ne, Nm, Tex, Denier Conversion Tool
yarnCountConverter.seoDescription: Free online yarn count converter. Convert between Ne, Nm, Tex, and Denier systems instantly. Essential tool for textile engineers.

resultantCount.title: परिणामी काउंट कैलकुलेटर
resultantCount.description: प्लाई यार्न के लिए परिणामी काउंट की गणना करें (उदाहरण: 32s/2)
resultantCount.seoTitle: Resultant Count Calculator - Ply Yarn Count Calculation
resultantCount.seoDescription: Calculate the resultant count of ply yarns. Essential for textile engineering and yarn production.

gsmCalculator.description: यार्न काउंट और घनत्व से कपड़े का वजन (GSM और Oz/yd²) की गणना करें
gsmCalculator.seoDescription: Calculate fabric GSM and Oz/yd² from yarn count and density. Free textile engineering calculator.

fabricConsumption.seoTitle: Fabric Consumption Calculator - Garment Fabric Usage
fabricConsumption.seoDescription: Calculate fabric consumption for garments. Essential tool for apparel merchandising and cost estimation.

cbmCalculator.seoDescription: Calculate CBM (cubic meters) for shipping containers. Get container type suggestions for your cargo.

twistCalculator.seoTitle: Twist Calculator - TPI TPM Conversion & Twist Factor
twistCalculator.seoDescription: Convert between TPI and TPM, calculate twist multiplier for yarn. Essential tool for textile spinning.

draftCalculator.seoTitle: Draft Calculator - Spinning Draft Ratio Calculation
draftCalculator.seoDescription: Calculate draft ratio in spinning using speed or roller diameter. Essential for textile engineering.

coverFactor.seoTitle: Cover Factor Calculator - Fabric Cover Factor (Pierce Formula)
coverFactor.seoDescription: Calculate fabric cover factor using Pierce formula. Essential for fabric design and quality control.

weaveBeamWeight.seoTitle: Weave Beam Weight Calculator - Warp Beam Weight
weaveBeamWeight.seoDescription: Calculate the weight of weave beam based on length, ends, and yarn count. Essential for weaving preparation.

fabricProduction.seoDescription: Calculate fabric production rate based on loom speed, PPI, and efficiency. Essential for production planning.

costEstimator.seoDescription: Calculate total production cost including material, labor, overhead, and profit margin. Essential for pricing.
